text.div:
This code system http://hl7.org/fhir/knowledge-resource-types defines the following codes:

CodeDisplayDefinition
ActivityDefinition ActivityDefinitionThe definition of a specific activity to be taken, independent of any particular patient or context.
CodeSystem CodeSystemA set of codes drawn from one or more code systems.
ConceptMap ConceptMapA map from one set of concepts to one or more other concepts.
Library LibraryRepresents a library of quality improvement components.
Measure MeasureA quality measure definition.
PlanDefinition PlanDefinitionThe definition of a plan for a series of actions, independent of any specific patient or context.
StructureDefinition StructureDefinitionStructural Definition.
StructureMap StructureMapA Map of relationships between 2 structures that can be used to transform data.
ValueSet ValueSetA set of codes drawn from one or more code systems.

name: KnowledgeResourceType
title: KnowledgeResourceType
description: A list of all the knowledge resource types defined in this version of the FHIR specification.

concept.definition: The definition of a specific activity to be taken, independent of any particular patient or context.
A set of codes drawn from one or more code systems.
A map from one set of concepts to one or more other concepts.
Represents a library of quality improvement components.
The definition of a plan for a series of actions, independent of any specific patient or context.
A Map of relationships between 2 structures that can be used to transform data.
A set of codes drawn from one or more code systems.
